pageContent: Introduction: Focal therapy for prostate cancer is a radical paradigm shift in the management of men with localised prostate cancer. It involves locating and destroying only the areas of prostate cancer whilst leaving the majority of the prostate untreated. By doing so, it is proposed that side-effects of traditional whole-gland therapies such as impotence, incontinence and rectal toxicity will be significantly reduced and cancer control will be at similar levels.
